HOME.TITLE: ExamYaar: School Notes, Sample Papers & More — Free & Easy
HOME.DESCRIPTION: ExamYaar is your trusted platform for school exam prep. Download revision notes, sample papers, mock tests, and more — all in one place. Freemium access with lifetime value.

DASHBOARD.TITLE: Your Study Material Dashboard | ExamYaar
DASHBOARD.DESCRIPTION: Access and manage all your downloaded notes, papers, and tests. Organize your exam prep with ExamYaar’s simple and intuitive dashboard.

RESOURCES.TITLE: Resources | ExamYaar
RESOURCES.DESCRIPTION: Browse and download a wide range of school study materials including revision notes, sample question papers, mock tests, and more—all organized by class, subject, and board.

TERMS.TITLE: Terms of Service | ExamYaar
TERMS.DESCRIPTION: Review the Terms of Service to understand your rights and responsibilities while using ExamYaar’s academic resources and features.

PRIVACY.TITLE: Privacy Policy | ExamYaar
PRIVACY.DESCRIPTION: Learn how ExamYaar collects, uses, and safeguards your personal data, and explore your privacy options.

ABOUT.TITLE: About | ExamYaar
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: Learn how ExamYaar empowers students with free and premium school exam resources—from revision notes to mock tests—built for academic success.

DISCOVER.TITLE: Discover | ExamYaar
DISCOVER.DESCRIPTION: Explore ExamYaar’s growing library of school notes, solved papers, mock exams, and study guides—curated for smart preparation.

PRICING.TITLE: Pricing | ExamYaar
PRICING.DESCRIPTION: Simple, affordable pricing. Most resources are free, with premium packs for deeper prep. No subscriptions—just what you need, when you need it.
